segments.text: The kitchen appears bright and functional during the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands by the sink, attentively drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of clean bowls wait on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a view of a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in fresh air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets are ajar, revealing the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy uses a stool to access the high shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while reaching with his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems steady enough for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl watches closely, arm extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, water is running from the faucet unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle that could cause issues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, still focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
